ORDER NOW
About
Fresh · Flavor · Family
Experience a tradition that’s been growing since 1999. Family owned and operated, Joseph’s Deli serves American cuisine with a Meditteranean flare.
Be A Part Of Our Family
Made Fresh, Your Way, Every Time!
Founded in 1999, Joseph’s Deli began its journey in a cozy space on Tamiami Trail in Port Charlotte, adorned with a captivating mural of New York City. Willie Hishmeh, previously immersed in the sub shop scene and running a successful carpet business, seized the opportunity to invest his profits into this promising deli venture.
From our humble beginnings, Joseph’s Deli has remained a cherished family-owned establishment, dedicated to offering our guests exceptional food at reasonable prices. We take immense pride in the quality of our ingredients, ensuring that all our soups and salads are crafted in-house. Our commitment to excellence is further exemplified by our trusted partnership with Performance Food Group, a leading provider of premium ingredients. For more insights into the exceptional products supplied by Performance Food Group, visit their website.
www.performancefoodservice.com
For many years, Joseph’s Deli has been aware of the poverty in Charlotte County. Did you know that 1 in every 5 kids in Charlotte County goes home hungry? We strive to give back to our community through the Homeless Coalition. We are aligned with their mission to help alleviate hunger and homelessness in our community.
Stop by Joseph’s Deli to give back to our community with our Cookies for A Cause Campaign. All donations go directly to the Programs and Services at the Homeless Coalition. For more information about the programs and services at the Homeless Coalition visit
www.performancefoodservice.com
